column4: very similar path to mine. I also started with Slack in 95. Been on Debian for over a year. When I, as an experiment, put ubuntu on my wife's laptop; my jaw hit the floor. Ubuntu is the cleanest distro that I have ever seen. I've been swaping machines to it for the last few weeks.
: i run a slackware/ubuntu hybrid system
I really like slack, but I got tired of the stressful upgrades
: i got scripts to compile sources for me
